Text.Page:
We're struggling to keep the nagas from gaining enough strength to be a real threat.

To that end, we're collecting naga eggs from the temple and disposing of them. Better now than after they've hatched and killed soldiers.

Get in there and poach some eggs!
Excellent. We have enough trouble without an army of nagas pouring out of the temple.
We can't afford to have the nagas breeding an army in the temple. We need those eggs.
